text:
As part of my studies in Information-Communication, I would like to go, for an Erasmus, In Paris for one year. I learn English since the primary but I think this is not enough for speaking fluenty english. I have for project to go to Paris for improve my english in an english-sepaking environment. Also, I think this experience will be so much interesting and enriching. So, this is the reasons for which I want to leave in the Paris.
But for that, I need financial help, because my job and my savings will not be able to the realisation of my project. This is one of my biggest dream to go to Paris, and I now that at the University there is purse that can help me to finalise my project. So I asking you if the University can help me financially ? And what are the conditions to be eligible to a potential purse ?
Tanks for the attention according to my text,
With all my respect.
"This webpage performs keylogging of input typed into a textbox. In other words, when focused on the textbox below, the page will record each time you hit a key or select text with your mouse. All of the data is stored locally on your machine in the DOM and is downloadable as a JSON file. More information about the motivation of this project and the format of the produced data are available here."
